roleset.name: to hum or sing softly
roleset.note: CROON-V NOTES: Frames file for 'croon' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from croon.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` The beautiful look of wool , '' croons *trace* the show 's narrator , `` slightly Victorian in its influence ... . ''
example.arg: *trace* -> [ The beautiful look of wool] [ slightly Victorian in its influence]
